1.title: Motor City Meltdown
1.plot: Bar expert John Green heads to Oxford Inn in Royal Oak, Michigan to help struggling owner Bob and his wife Mary get back on the path to success. After Bob's battle with cancer and a huge loss of business, Bob and Mary built an additional bar onto their already shabby restaurant in hopes of attracting more clients but with no luck.

2.title: Up in Smoke
2.plot: John Green visits San Diego to lend his expertise to failing hookah bar, Ali Baba's Cave. With a tired theme and tired owner, John has to figure out how to keep Ali Baba's afloat.

3.title: Dive Bar Reborn
3.plot: Owner Jen has struggled to balance running her dive bar and raising her children since losing her husband one year ago. John Green must turn the aging San Diego landmark, London's West End, into the ultimate nighttime destination.

4.title: Texas Transformation
4.plot: John Green visits 12 Whiskey, a lounge in Fort Worth, Texas, that is located directly across from a college campus. Swindled by a third partner, the owners have no bar experience, limited capital and are in over their heads.

5.title: Small Town Insecurity
5.plot: John Green visits Boxcar, a neglected establishment in Cedar Hill, Texas. Three squabbling siblings with no bar experience and mounting debts have dwindled their parents' retirement funds while running the bar into the ground.

6.title: Fight Bar Failure
6.plot: John Green must transform Ringside, a fight-themed bar in Huntington Beach, CA, that is struggling to stay on its feet. Now $300,000 in debt, owner Travis is unable to pay his bills. If things don't turn around soon, he will be forced to close his doors and declare bankruptcy.

7.title: Reputation Revamp
7.plot: On the Rocks is revamping one of Hawthorne California's oldest bars - The Falcon Inn. Years of mis-management ruined the bar's reputation and it's up to John to get them back on track. When he arrives, he finds inconsistency and a lack of standards everywhere he looks - bartenders who consistently over-pour, a disliked manager with zero bar experience and a young owner in dire need of direction. John will transform this dingy bar into a hip and modern cantina that will feature new craft cocktails and fresh Mexican fare that will capture the hip, young set the owner so...

8.title: Irish Pub Troubles
8.plot: Owner Lori was a bartender at Mulligan's before becoming its sole owner. When she took over the bar, business was booming. Unfortunately that success was short-lived due to a downturn in the economy, bad blood with the previous managers, big changes to the menu and a lowering of the pour count. If ever there was somewhere that needed a "do-over" it's Mulligan's. When John Green shows up he sees inexperienced bartenders, no management structure, steak being nuked in the microwave and laziness that makes his head spin. Extensive bar training, a major revamping of the ...

imdb.title: On the Rocks
plot: Nightlight expert John Green helps in the makeover of failing clubs and bars.::anonymous
